skips Update validation groups, allowing whitespace-only fields due to @Pattern(groups=Update.class)","confidence":0.95},{"filename":"src/main/java/com/llmquality/baseline/service/AddressServiceImpl.java","start_line":67,"end_line":67,"error_description":"Unsafe addressRepository.findById(addressId).get() without existence check;
